title: USA and Canada Will Fight for Hockey Gold Tonight.
summary: The rivalry. The final day. The biggest game in winter sports.
content:
The men's hockey gold medal game is set. **USA vs Canada.** Tonight. In Milan.

It's the game both countries wanted. The game everyone else feared.

The Americans thrashed Slovakia in the semifinal. Canada ground through their bracket with the efficiency of a country that considers hockey a birthright.

## 46 | Years since the Miracle on Ice

Today is February 22. The anniversary of the 1980 "Miracle on Ice" — USA beating the Soviet Union in Lake Placid.

The timing is almost too perfect.

>> "We're not thinking about 1980. We're thinking about tonight." — USA Hockey

This isn't a miracle. Both teams belong here. The US has 11 golds in these Games — their best Winter Olympics ever. Canada has been building toward this since PyeongChang.

One game. One gold. The last event before the closing ceremony.

!! The anniversary. The rivalry. The stage. Hockey doesn't get bigger than this.
